attributes.name: Ironbark Blaster
attributes.description: "Great hulks of enchanted wood adorn either side of the rifle."
attributes.parsed_description: "Great hulks of enchanted wood adorn either side of the rifle."

attributes.name: Iron Briar
attributes.description: "The graceful curves of the swept design fail to belie the malign intent."
attributes.parsed_description: "The graceful curves of the swept design fail to belie the malign intent."

attributes.name: Iron Fire Staff
attributes.description: 2-Handed. An iron staff that is used to channel Fire Magic.
attributes.parsed_description: 2-Handed. An iron staff that is used to channel Fire Magic.

attributes.name: Iron Great Axe
attributes.description: 2-Handed. A Great Axe made of Iron. Exclusively favors Strength for dealing damage.
attributes.parsed_description: 2-Handed. A Great Axe made of Iron. Exclusively favors Strength for dealing damage.

attributes.name: Iron Hatchet
attributes.description: 1-Handed. A Hatchet made of Iron. Favors Strength for dealing damage, but Dexterity also contributes. Can be thrown.
attributes.parsed_description: 1-Handed. A Hatchet made of Iron. Favors Strength for dealing damage, but Dexterity also contributes. Can be thrown.

attributes.name: Iron Ice Gauntlet
attributes.description: A magical gauntlet that channels the Ice element.
attributes.parsed_description: A magical gauntlet that channels the Ice element.

attributes.name: Ironjaw's Bite
attributes.description: "As sharp as Ironjaw's teeth, it strikes as fast as Ironjaw's bite."
attributes.parsed_description: "As sharp as Ironjaw's teeth, it strikes as fast as Ironjaw's bite."

attributes.name: Iron Life Staff
attributes.description: 2-handed. An iron staff that is used to channel Life Magic.
attributes.parsed_description: 2-handed. An iron staff that is used to channel Life Magic.

attributes.name: Iron Longsword
attributes.description: 1-Handed. A Longsword made of Iron. Favors Strength for dealing damage, but Dexterity also contributes.
attributes.parsed_description: 1-Handed. A Longsword made of Iron. Favors Strength for dealing damage, but Dexterity also contributes.

attributes.name: Iron Musket
attributes.description: 2-Handed. A Musket made of Iron. Favors Dexterity and Intelligence for dealing damage. Fires Cartridges.
attributes.parsed_description: 2-Handed. A Musket made of Iron. Favors Dexterity and Intelligence for dealing damage. Fires Cartridges.

attributes.name: Iron Rapier
attributes.description: 1-Handed. A Rapier made of Iron. Favors Dexterity and Intelligence for dealing damage.
attributes.parsed_description: 1-Handed. A Rapier made of Iron. Favors Dexterity and Intelligence for dealing damage.

attributes.name: Iron Round Shield
attributes.description: A Round Shield made of Iron.
attributes.parsed_description: A Round Shield made of Iron.

attributes.name: Iron Siege hammer
attributes.description: 2-Handed. A Siege Hammer made of Iron. Designed for destroying structures, and most effective when used on gates. Exclusively favors Strength for dealing damage.
attributes.parsed_description: 2-Handed. A Siege Hammer made of Iron. Designed for destroying structures, and most effective when used on gates. Exclusively favors Strength for dealing damage.

attributes.name: Iron War Hammer
attributes.description: 2-Handed. A War Hammer made of Iron. Exclusively favors Strength for dealing damage.
attributes.parsed_description: 2-Handed. A War Hammer made of Iron. Exclusively favors Strength for dealing damage.

attributes.name: Ironwood Bow
attributes.description: 2-Handed. A Bow made of Ironwood. Exclusively favors Dexterity for dealing damage. Fires Arrows.
attributes.parsed_description: 2-Handed. A Bow made of Ironwood. Exclusively favors Dexterity for dealing damage. Fires Arrows.

attributes.name: Ironwood Spear
attributes.description: 2-Handed. A Spear with an Ironwood haft. Favors Dexterity for dealing damage, but Strength also contributes. Can be thrown.
attributes.parsed_description: 2-Handed. A Spear with an Ironwood haft. Favors Dexterity for dealing damage, but Strength also contributes. Can be thrown.

attributes.name: Irony
attributes.description: "Only a true fool hides from inevitability."
attributes.parsed_description: "Only a true fool hides from inevitability."

attributes.name: Irreverent Edge
attributes.description: "The tip of the spear is coated with broken shards of glass, creating a mean and vile weapon that seeks to inflict pain more than it seeks to kill."
attributes.parsed_description: "The tip of the spear is coated with broken shards of glass, creating a mean and vile weapon that seeks to inflict pain more than it seeks to kill."

attributes.name: Isabella's Chosen
attributes.description: "I hope you find what you are looking for."
attributes.parsed_description: "I hope you find what you are looking for."

attributes.name: Isabella's Rapier
attributes.description: "How many has Isabella slain with this? No matter, it's yours now, and the count can begin afresh."
attributes.parsed_description: "How many has Isabella slain with this? No matter, it's yours now, and the count can begin afresh."

attributes.name: Isomir, the Blighted Tender's Spear
attributes.description: "The Greenkeeper was charged with guarding the most sacred of places to the Dryads. The spread of blight into such a sanctuary does not bode well for their kind."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Greenkeeper was charged with guarding the most sacred of places to the Dryads. The spread of blight into such a sanctuary does not bode well for their kind."

attributes.name: It shines and sparkles like a pouch full of diamonds.
attributes.name_with_affixes: It shines and sparkles like a pouch full of diamonds.
attributes.description: "Fashionable and efficient. The Aeternian way."
attributes.parsed_description: "Fashionable and efficient. The Aeternian way."

attributes.name: Jagged Amethyst Cleaver
attributes.description: "The beauty and the brutality of this weapon are not lost on you."
attributes.parsed_description: "The beauty and the brutality of this weapon are not lost on you."

attributes.name: Jagged Edged Javelin
attributes.description: "Hooks adorn the edge of the spear's head, allowing it to remain stuck inside any victim."
attributes.parsed_description: "Hooks adorn the edge of the spear's head, allowing it to remain stuck inside any victim."

attributes.name: Járngreipr
attributes.description: "It was with a glove like this that Thor was able to take hold of Mjölnir."
attributes.parsed_description: "It was with a glove like this that Thor was able to take hold of Mjölnir."

attributes.name: Javelin of Dryadic Empowerment
attributes.description: "Imbued within this weapon is the memory of a thousand Dryads. Their knowledge is now yours to command."
attributes.parsed_description: "Imbued within this weapon is the memory of a thousand Dryads. Their knowledge is now yours to command."

attributes.name: Javelin of Just Intent
attributes.description: "Weather the storm in your heart and find peace within."
attributes.parsed_description: "Weather the storm in your heart and find peace within."

attributes.name: Javelin of the Corrupted Maiden
attributes.description: "Before she was turned by the power of corruption, she was a warrior of great renown. After she was turned, her visage imbued fear into the hearts of all who had the misfortune to come upon her."
attributes.parsed_description: "Before she was turned by the power of corruption, she was a warrior of great renown. After she was turned, her visage imbued fear into the hearts of all who had the misfortune to come upon her."

attributes.name: Javelin of the Corrupted Vanguard
attributes.description: "The vanguard of the corrupted forces are a fearsome lot. When they descend upon an army, none are left alive."
attributes.parsed_description: "The vanguard of the corrupted forces are a fearsome lot. When they descend upon an army, none are left alive."

attributes.name: Jawbreaker
attributes.description: "Nothing says 'stop talking' like a hatchet to the jaw."
attributes.parsed_description: "Nothing says 'stop talking' like a hatchet to the jaw."

attributes.name: Jenning's Fury
attributes.description: "Nothin' makes me feel more alive than personally holdin' open Death's door for you to step through."
attributes.parsed_description: "Nothin' makes me feel more alive than personally holdin' open Death's door for you to step through."
